title: Jazz Moods - Jazz in the Afternoon (2000) [Jazz][mp3 320][h33t][
description:
Jazz Moods - Jazz in the Afternoon 
Original Release Date: April 25, 2000 
Audio CD: April 25, 2000 
Label: Concord Records
Bitrate: 320 kbps 

Another album of Jazz Moods gives us a chance to enjoy "Jazz In The Afternoon" for a "take it easy" part of the day with some of the most talented artists performing ten classic tunes. There are many selections from - "IF I WERE A BELL" (Frank Loesser) performed by Gary Burton & Friends, light-upbeat and lively - "EASY LIVING" (Ralph Rainger/Leo Robin) the Alan Broadbent Trio plays this relaxing and stylish theme - "LUV IN THE AFTERNOON" (Jeanie & Jimmy Cheatham) low-down blues and with a beat performed by the composers. A few stand outs - "DAYDREAM" (Ellington/Latouche/Strayhorn) performed by Karin Allyson, simply beautiful - "SASHAY" (Oscar Brashear) with talented Rickey Woodard at his smooth and flowing best.

Producer Nick Phillips and Concord Records have outdone themselves with this outstanding compilation for a walk in the park or a stroll down memory lane for you the listener to enjoy anytime of the day - but how about - "Jazz In The Afternoon"! ~ J. Lovins

Jazz Moods - Jazz in the Afternoon Tracks:
01  Gary Burton and Friends  - If I Were A Bell
02  Alan Broadbent Trio - Easy Living
03  Jeannie and Jimmy Cheatham - Luv In The Afternoon
04  Gene Harris Quartet - Strollin'
05  Kenny Werner and Chris Potter - Sail Away
06  Karrin Allyson - Daydream
07  Rickey Woodard - Sashay
08  Ali Ryerson - Blue In The Green
09  Carol Sloane - Isn't This A Lovely Day
10  Kenny Barron - Sunshower
